title: Obama’s New Netflix Entertainment
sub_head: America’s 44th president has a keen sense of humor.
body:
Say what you will about former President Barack Obama but the man certainly has an appreciation for irony. Only in American media could a man present himself as the new chief advocate for public green spaces at the same time his presidential center is fending off litigation intended to stop its bulldozing of a historic park. Specifically, this week Netflix is launching Mr. Obama’s televised call for conservation right on the heels of the Obama center’s latest courtroom victory over conservationists.
Carson Burton, Sasha Urban and Wilson Chapman report in Variety:
